summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding a draft Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty (MLAT) request to the United Kingdom. The request seeks an interview with Prince Andrew in connection with investigations into Jeffrey Epstein and Peter Nygard.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: The email is addressed to him, indicating he is the recipient of the draft MLAT request.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: She is copied on the email and is likely involved in the legal process regarding the MLAT request.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The draft MLAT request seeks an interview with him regarding the Epstein and Nygard investigations.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The investigation into him is one of the subjects for which Prince Andrew's interview is sought.

persons.name: Peter Nygard
persons.context: The investigation into him is the other subject for which Prince Andrew's interview is sought.

connections.description: Prince Andrew is a subject of an interview request in the Epstein investigation, indicating a connection under scrutiny.
Prince Andrew is also a subject of an interview request in the Nygard investigation.
Both are legal officials at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, collaborating on the MLAT request.

events.title: Draft MLAT Request to UK
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for SDNY drafts a Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty request to the United Kingdom seeking an interview with Prince Andrew.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for SDNY was actively seeking to interview Prince Andrew in March 2020 regarding the Epstein and Nygard investigations.
The mechanism for this request was a Mutual Legal Assistance Treaty (MLAT) to the United Kingdom.
The document links the investigations into Jeffrey Epstein and Peter Nygard through the figure of Prince Andrew.
The correspondence involves senior SDNY officials Geoffrey Berman and Audrey Strauss.
